entry.name: HiddenHunterFlavor
entry.value: A Lictor's primary purpose is to lead the Tyranid swarm to fresh prey and seek out large groups of foes that might be hiding or fleeing before the swarm.

entry.name: MindEaterFlavor
entry.value: Feeder tendrils drain the victimâ€™s skull, siphoning vital knowledge and memories with every scrap of brain matter.

entry.name: SupriseAmbushDescription
entry.value: Increases the accuracy and armor penatration of overwatch attacks.

entry.name: SupriseAmbushFlavor
entry.value: A master assassin, the Deathleaper can spend days hiding immobile, waiting for a chance to strike once its prey's guard is down.
